Function to recode early initiation of breastfeeding indicator for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Survey

Source: R/04-recode_iycf.R
recode_eibf.Rd

Function to recode early initiation of breastfeeding indicator for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Survey

recode_eibf(df)

Arguments

df

A data.frame collected for the Myanmar MCCT Programme Evaluation Study containing IYCF/breastfeeding data

Value

A vector of recoded early initiation of breastfeeding status

Examples

iycfDF <- create_iycf(df = iycf, x = hh, y = hhMembers)
recode_eibf(df = iycfDF)
